des:
With Thinking Cap Math your child can practice K-4 math skills in an exciting new way, and achieve significant results!

Join Coach Fred and other members of the math team to help win the Thinking Cap Math Championship. Have fun drilling math concepts and solve hilarious word problems as you move up the Championship League Ladder, from Very Speedy Amoebas through Courageous Chickens, and even -- whooooooo would have thought it -- all the way to the Funky Owls.

As kids play, they master fundamental math skills including addition, subtraction, skip counting and multiplication. And with a supply of thousands, there are new questions and stories every time you play.

INSTRUCTIONS FOR USE:

To enable the skill, simply say "Alexa, open Thinking Cap”.

To repeat the question, say "Repeat"

If you would like a few seconds to think over the problem, just say "Let me think."

SPECIAL NOTE TO AUDIENCES WITH LEARNING DISABILITIES:

The Thinking Cap Math team works closely with teachers and students with learning disabilities and visual impairments to make the program especially effective for these audiences. Our skill is exceptionally useful for students of all types who face challenges with reading and writing, and can enable them to achieve high levels of math literacy.
